newsitem.title: USA: Northern S.D. gas compressor back on-line.
newsitem.headline: Northern S.D. gas compressor back on-line.

text.p: Northern Border, a unit of Enron Corp, said Monday that a natural gas compressor station near Aberdeen, S.D., shut over the weekend due to a valve problem, returned to service Sunday afternoon.
An Enron Corp spokeswoman at company headquarters in Houston later denied the station had reopened, saying it would likely resume operations later Monday.
She said the outage was not affecting deliveries.
The Northern Border pipeline system is currently carrying about 1.7 billion cubic feet of gas a day (bcf/d).
